Summary: Orange/Red Light observed hovering, no noise, and then ascended until disappeared
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Hampton
There were no other sightings in Hampton on or around September 10th 2011
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: sighting detailswhile walking our dogs on 5th street in hampton, va., at approximately 8:15 pm on september 10, 2011, my mom and i observed what at first appeared to be a falling star. my mom even commented, "look! is that a falling star?" as it came closer into our immediate field of vision, probably not more than a mile from us overhead, it just stopped moving and hovered above the trees. it appeared as a glowing red\orange ball of light, i can best describe it as resembling a "fireball." it remained stationary for just a few minutes and then began to move west at a very slow pace. it slowly ascended higher until it was completely out of sight and just disappeared.
